My name is Austin Redmon and I am pleased to announce my candidacy for Shelby County Circuit Court Clerk.

Our campaign is about Public Service First and that promise begins with me. I am committed to serving the public well through leading by example. Everyone that works in or comes in contact with the circuit clerkâ€™s office will be shown respect and treated with dignity. We will build a more transparent and accessible office for everyone.

I respectfully ask for your support and your vote.

Austin Redmon for Circuit Court Clerk
